org.bhave.sweeper

Class ParameterSweepUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.bhave.sweeper.ParameterSweepUtil

  • public class ParameterSweepUtil
extends java.lang.Object

    Utility class with static methods to create different ParameterSweep objects and CombinedParameterSweep objects.

    With this you can create single value parameter sweeps, sequence parameter sweeps and list parameter sweeps.
    Author:
    Davide Nunes
    See Also:
    ParameterSweep, CombinedParameterSweep

      • createSweep

        public static <T> org.bhave.sweeper.ParameterSweep createSweep(java.lang.String param,
                                               java.util.List<T> values)
        A generic method to create ListSweep objects. These are basically parameter sweeps with a given list of values.
        Parameters:
        param - the name of the parameters
        values - the given values for the parameter
        Returns:
        a list parameter sweep with multiple values for the given parameter

      • createSweep

        public static org.bhave.sweeper.ParameterSweep createSweep(java.lang.String param,
                                           int from,
                                           int to,
                                           int step)
        Creates a SequenceSweep object. This generates a sequence of Integer values for a given parameters according that range from an initial to a final value using a step to generate the sequence.
        Parameters:
        param - the name of the parameter.
        from - the initial sequence value.
        to - the final sequence value.
        step - the value used to build the sequence.
        Returns:
        a sequence parameter sweep that generates a sequence of values in a lazy way according to the given parameters.

      • createSweep

        public static org.bhave.sweeper.ParameterSweep createSweep(java.lang.String param,
                                           double from,
                                           double to,
                                           double step)
        Creates a SequenceSweep object. This generates a sequence of Double values for a given parameters according that range from an initial to a final value using a step to generate the sequence.
        Parameters:
        param - the name of the parameter.
        from - the initial sequence value.
        to - the final sequence value.
        step - the value used to build the sequence.
        Returns:
        a sequence parameter sweep that generates a sequence of values in a lazy way according to the given parameters.

      • createCombiedSweep

        public static org.bhave.sweeper.impl.CombinedParameterSweep createCombiedSweep(java.util.List<org.bhave.sweeper.ParameterSweep> sweeps,
                                                               int runs)

        Creates a CombinedParameterSweep which can be used to combine multiple ParameterSweep objects into one structure which also implements Iterable of Configuration objects.

        The iterator for this class generates Configuration objects with all the possible parameter combinations according to the parameter sweeps used to create this object.

        The order of the generated configurations also depende on the order of the parameter sweeps passed down in the list.

        Example:

        for two parameters p1 = {0,1} and p2 = {2,3}, the combined parameter sweep will provide an iterator that generates the configurations:

        c1 = {p1=0, p2=2}
        c2 = {p1=0, p2=3}
        c3 = {p1=1, p2=2}
        c4 = {p1=1, p2=3}

        also, the number of runs passed will repeat each configuration a number of times equals to the given runs value.

        For example, for a number of runs = 2, the configuration values would be:

        c1 = {p1=0, p2=2}
        c2 = {p1=0, p2=2}
        c3 = {p1=0, p2=3}
        c4 = {p1=0, p2=3}
        c5 = {p1=1, p2=2}
        c6 = {p1=1, p2=2}
        c7 = {p1=1, p2=3}
        c8 = {p1=1, p2=3}

        Parameters:
        sweeps - the parameter sweeps used to construct this CombinedParameterSweep
        runs - the number of runs for each possible parameter configuration
        Returns:
        a CombinedParameterSweep which is basically an Iterable structure with all the possible configurations given the supplied parameter sweeps.
